definition: (bird species of China) falcated duck (Anas falcata)

sentences.english: This pipe they use a rib connection.
sentences.chinese: 这种管道大多采用罗纹连接。

sentences.english: Ribbed trim and removable blue lining at drawstring hood.
sentences.chinese: 罗纹修剪和可移动的蓝色衬拉绳罩。

sentences.english: That's rib as in knitting(4) the cuff(5) of your sweater.
sentences.chinese: 我们所说的罗纹编织正是你毛衣袖口的织法。

sentences.english: Imported. overview Supersoft and comfortable french rib knit cotton crewneck.
sentences.chinese: 概述超软，舒适的法国罗纹针织棉圆领。

sentences.english: He liked the rib stitch on the cuffs of the sweater.
sentences.chinese: 他喜欢在这毛衣袖口上的罗纹针织。

sentences.english: Ribbing in knitting employs both knit stitches and purl stitches to create elasticity.
sentences.chinese: 员工都在针织罗纹编织针针法和金银丝创造弹性。

sentences.english: Weft streak is one of the major defects of habotai fabrics.
sentences.chinese: 罗纹档是纺类织物纬向方面的主要病疵之一。

sentences.english: Ribbed crew neckline with attached drawstring hood lined in soft waffle-knit cotton.
sentences.chinese: 船员附有拉绳罩罗纹领口内衬软华夫格针织棉。

sentences.english: Straight-through one-way valves installed in a connecting thread of the pipeline.
sentences.chinese: 直通式单向阀用罗纹毗连安装在管路上。

sentences.english: Sloping twin-spar frame in thin wall box section cast aluminium, with reinforcement cross-ribbing.
sentences.chinese: 坡双梁框架薄壁箱节铸铝，以加强跨罗纹。

sentences.english: Add the specification that "Spirality after washing will not be tested on the rib and elastic lap."
sentences.chinese: 增加了罗纹和松紧下摆款式不考核水洗后扭曲度。

sentences.english: Knit ribbing from ankle to cuff.
sentences.chinese: 从脚踝到袖口的针织罗纹。

sentences.english: All ribbing inc orp orates radius edges to prevent sub-surface damage or cutting.
sentences.chinese: 所有罗纹采用半径边缘，以防止亚表面损伤或切割。

sentences.english: Knit ribbing with tips from a knitting teacher in this free video on yarn crafts.
sentences.chinese: 针织罗纹与技巧在这个自由视频针织纱工艺从老师。

sentences.english: Long sleeves with finely ribbed cuffs, stand collar.
sentences.chinese: 与细罗纹袖口长袖，立领。

definition: Jacquard weave (machine weaving leaving protruding pattern)
crew neck/round neck (of pull-over garment, e.g. T-shirt)
